reviews.review: One of the best multiplayer games out there, nothing comes close.

This is the best damn apocalyptic survival horror co-op multiplayer shooter game that I know of. The game developer Valve made a good decision in allowing the modding community to customise their game, and that alone has added to this game's longevity. After many years, and with ~7000 hours of playtime, I'm still very much addicted to this game. :)

My very own [url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/hardcore4][u]HardA server[/u][/url] is proof enough that this game has not been left 4 dead!
One of the best FPS games ever.  So much fun and has great replay value. Never gets old.
The original that brought on Left 4 Dead 2. Definetly recommend getting it!

FPS coop avec bots/joueurs, contre des invasions de zombies, L4D vous fait jouer sur quelques cartes et scénarios différents où le but est généralement de s'échapper de la ville, celle-ci étant contaminée, les habitants sont devenus des morts vivants. Certains infectés sont même plus forts que les autres et font office de "mini boss". Plusieurs modes de jeu, des succès Steam, différentes approches, le jeu révèle son fun en coop. Toutefois, Left4dead2 incluant déjà les maps du 1, je ne conseille le 1 que pour les chasseurs de succès.

This is pretty much the best game ever. Learn the mechanics on Single Player, then enjoy endless hours with teammates. Best Coop game. Better than L4D2. If you can only get one, get this one. And then there are the plethora of unbelievably well-done mods. Get this game!!

This game is unreplaceable and requires a variety of tweaky skills, to learn and exploit, which is quite rare to see in a game today!

      L4D is a lot better than its sequel!

Go pro, be Left for Dead today

A Great team game that keeps you on your feet. I wouldn't suggest it for solo play but the option is there. 
My Rating: 7/10
9 Out Of 10, Play It With Friends And You Will See!
Good, but there's not much point going for this one as the second one, L4D2, got all the maps anyway.

Probably the best zombie game I have ever played, the only draw back (and its quite big at times) is that the computer controlled 'survivors' are beyond retarted.  They will run off into danger or walk right in front of your bullets at any second.
Well, this game follows a simple rule: be one of those Boomers or die covered in vomit.
Best zombie game out there! U will not find no other like this one mang! =)

Good co-op fun with friends however everybody has moved on to the sequel which has had all the content from this game patched into it and adjusted to fix some of the issues present in this game's versions.

Ehhh si ta bueno,,, sobre todo si te toca un buen ekipete, pero mi recomendacion, no te lo compres por ke esta lleno de petes... jajaja. Se reniega mucho, despues te hace mal como al Cantina y te salen frases como: "Ke problema tengo aki pa"
O frases como "Yo mando ehh" o "Dale Pepo,Kogote", etc.
Un gran juego si te kabe el Versus, o el coop on line, para single player mejor conectate la wi papa. 
Asi ke mandale versus ke los violentos te esperan pa.
the second one is better but come on its still awsome

10/10

The most original zombie game EVER from Valve. They don't get better than this...[yet]. This game will satisfy your blood-thirst for sure. Play 4 vs 4; survivor vs infected. Or as survivor alone or with friends to beat campaigns. Whatever game mode you choose you can be sure that it will be filled with zombies who are desperate to eat you! Great dark atmosphere, professional soundtrack and pleasing polished graphics to be immersed in. Don't forget to check out the mods.

*Due to the early release of L4D2, this game did not see a long life. Make your pick or play both. You will have fun either way!
Best thing about this game is the community!
best game i ever play on a pc

This game rocks the world! :D 
You can kill as many zombies and infected as possible! Get this game now!

Excellent jeu de zombies dans lequelle on verra beaucoup de sang et de cervelles gicler dans tout les sens ! 

Echappez aux zombies en veillant donc les uns sur les autres car Left 4 Dead est un FPS basé en grande partie sur la coopération.

Les campagnes sont vraiment superbes avec une trés bonne ambiance. 

Et bien sur ce jeu est jouable en coop jusqu'à 4 joueurs et avec des amis c'est encore mieux ! 

Puis en plus sur PC il y a la possibilité de télécharger des campagnes amateur ! Bref ce jeu est à ne pas manquer si vous êtes fan de zombies ! 

Donc en co-op ou en versus, ce jeu déborde de possibilités et on se laisse vite surprendre à y passer de très nombreuses heures.

Most likely my favourite multiplayer game I've ever played. It's a shame it really doesn't have very many people playing it but hopefully now that valve has returned to making video games they will return to this series.
That said the first game will always be my favourite and I have many fond memories playing this game with friends I met online. Nearly 2000 hours in this game, what I wouldn't do to be able to put another 2000 into it.

Решил немного поиграть в одиночку, вспомнить, как мы с друзьями резались в компьютерном клубе...
Натыкаюсь на Ведьму....бот ее пугает. 
Она как заорет, я естественно с ботами, начинаем стрелять, но вместо того, чтобы накинуться на меня или кого то - она просто начинает орать, и схватившись за голову, бежит в начало локации.

One of the most enjoyable games I have ever had the pleasure of owning. Please do not allow yourself be swayed or discouraged over the mere fact that a sequel exist. I, along with many others have been able to enjoy this game on it's own merits more so then it's successor.

I personally have clocked more playtime into this title then it's sequel. If one grows tired of the vanilla base campaigns, then there are many user created custom maps just waiting to be downloaded. I can personally, wholeheartedly vouch for that.

There are many quality created custom maps I have had the pleasure of playing alone, or with a group of randoms/friends, and enjoying them immensely. Do not pass up on this gem.

If the current price or the shiny fact that Left 4 Dead 2 is side by side also priced the same, still has you reconsidering whether it's a purchase or not, then please at least consider it when it goes on sale.

Many hours of fun and zombie shooting will be had when you jump into this game.

Happy zombie hunting and don't forget to grab your pills. ^_^

Si te gustan los zombies y ya que sea multijugador, coorreee por que te vas a cagar!

Survival horror party???  Intense, heart pounding multiplayer cooperative action???  Do I want to not only shoot never ending hoards of zombies... but, also have the opportunity to actually be one of the zombies in the never ending hoard????  Yes please!!!  

Valve doesn't disappoint in this truly cinematic, atmospheric, fast paced, fun game... If you love to hate on zombies... this game is for you….  And if you’ve always wanted to be the zombie (or bad guy)… this game is doubly for you.
awsome game

Ah Left 4 Dead, my first impressions of this game were blwon away once i took up a keyboard and mouse and started to play in it's linear yet chilling setting, suspense, action packed adventure.

A.I. is incredibly insane one moment I look behind my back then next I'm being attacked by a hunter just after I look away. Incredibly the A.I. System Valve has done for this game is incredibly insanely intense. Trust me you will get PARANOID. 

Sure there are moment when your in awe, but what happens after that? the maps show the same route, but what's different than going through each campaign is the route the zombies will come after you. I must give props to Valve for doing this, in order to maintain constant replayability and ACHIEVEMENTS, of course they want the game to live on, but by doing this I was surprised. Never I think have i encountered such an ingenious method such as Valve.

One of the tiny gems overlooked that I now enjoy to play with my friends.

Teamwork is a MUST!

9.25/10

Save yourself some money and just get the second game, Left 4 Dead 2. It has everything this game has plus a ton more. No really, it has all the old characters, weapons, levels, story PLUS the Left 4 Dead 2 stuff. Just get the 2nd game if you want this. You are not missing anything.
